item.title: List of Music Production Courses, Reviews & YouTube Channels
item.description: Music Production Websites Ask Video - Ableton, Cubase, Logic Pro, Native Instruments … Born to Produce Groove3 - Ableton, BitWig Studio, Cubase, FL Studio, Logic Pro, Maschine … macProVideo Point Blank Music School Steinberg Music Production Courses Ableton Udemy Tomas George - music producer, composer & audio engineer Ableton Live 11 - Music Production in Ableton Live - learn music production, recording, editing, music mixing, songwriting & music theory Logic Pro Udemy Tomas George - music producer, composer & audio engineer Music Production in Logic Pro X - The Beginners Guide!
item.content:encoded:
Music Production Websites

  • Ask Video - Ableton, Cubase, Logic Pro, Native Instruments …
  • Born to Produce
  • Groove3 - Ableton, BitWig Studio, Cubase, FL Studio, Logic Pro, Maschine …
  • macProVideo
  • Point Blank Music School
  • Steinberg

Music Production Courses

Ableton

  • Udemy
    • Tomas George - music producer, composer & audio engineer
      • Ableton Live 11 - Music Production in Ableton Live - learn music production, recording, editing, music mixing, songwriting & music theory

Logic Pro

  • Udemy
    • Tomas George - music producer, composer & audio engineer
      • Music Production in Logic Pro X - The Beginners Guide! - learn the basics of setting up, creating music & music production in Logic Pro X
      • Music Production in Logic Pro X - The Complete Course! - creating, recording, mixing music & mastering in Logic Pro X

Music Theory

  • ThinkSpace Education
    • General Composition
      • Harmony One
      • Harmony Two
      • How To Write Music
      • Learn Music Theory

Piano Lessons

  • Flowkey - practice notes and chords interactively and receive instant feedback
  • Piano Genius - how to start playing your favorite songs now without the time and frustration of traditional lessons
  • Piano University - become a piano superhuman
  • Pianote - online piano lessons for all skill levels
  • Skoove - complete online piano learning method

YouTube Channels

Below is a list of my favourite music production YouTube channels

  • Andrew Huang - Canadian YouTube personality, musician & video producer
  • Andertons - music hardware & software reviews
  • Arturia - Arturia official YouTube channel
  • BoBeats - videos about synthesizers and music production gear
  • Charles Cleyn - songwriting, music production, and marketing strategies to create and release great music
  • Doctor Mix - music production hardware & software reviews, also offers mixing & mastering service
  • Glenn Main - Norwegian electronic music composer
  • Guy Michelmore / ThinkSpace Education
  • In The Mix - simplifying the recording, production, mixing and mastering process
  • Jef Gibbons - video production, photography & music production
  • Loopop - in-depth electronic music & synth ideas tips, tricks & reviews
  • Masteringâ€¤com
  • Mix with the Masters
  • Native Instruments Native Instruments official YouTube channel
  • Nu-Trix The Synth Guy - synthesizer reviews & music production
  • PlugInGuru - created by John “Skippy” Lehmkuhl (Korg sound designer), home of the amazing Unify plugin
  • Point Blank Music School - music school with courses in London, LA, Ibiza & Online
  • Raveyard Sounds - music production tutorials
  • Roland - music production hardware
  • SamTheBeardGuy - virtual instrument reviews
  • Sanjay C - music production, gear & tips
  • School of Synthesis
  • Simeon Amburgey - virtual instrument reviews
  • SonicState - gear reviews, interviews and features
  • Sound On Sound - recording & music technology magazine
  • Spectrasonics - official Spectrasonics videos for Omnisphere & Keyscape
  • State Azure - electronic music producer from the UK
  • Sweetwater - giving music makers the ultimate shopping experience
  • Underdog Electronic Music School
  • Venus Theory - music production & reviews
  • Vulture Culture - uncovering the hidden gems of the synth world
  • Woody Piano Shack - music production & reviews

Music Software & Plugin Deals

  • Audio Plugin Guy
